CustomField.formula: IF(AND(TEXT(BDD_Line_of_Business__c) == 'STUSCO',TEXT(MDN_CP_Rel_Desc__c) != 'Vendor Only',OR(TEXT(MDN_OI_Company__c) = 'US16 (0201) - SOPUS',TEXT(MDN_OI_Company__c)= 'USN6 (0301) - STUSCO (Domestic)',TEXT(MDN_OI_Company__c) = '0308 - STUSCO (Puerto Rico)',TEXT(MDN_OI_Company__c) = 'MX01 - Shell Mexico',TEXT(MDN_OI_Company__c) = 'XXXX - SCAPSA (Argentina)'),OR(TEXT(MDN_OI_Business_Line__c) = 'Products',TEXT(MDN_OI_Business_Line__c) = 'Broker - Products',TEXT(MDN_OI_Business_Line__c) = 'Terminalling',TEXT(MDN_OI_Business_Line__c) = 'Marine - Products',TEXT(MDN_OI_Business_Line__c) = 'SOPUS NOC')),true,false)
CustomField.label: Is Gsap Available
